There are sooooo many applications for this.

And about a billion other things I can't think of off the top of my head.  
  
The fact of the matter is, any card that costs 2 and draws you three cards is very, very good.

posts.post_content:
Opp plays Squadron Hawk, next turn cast-  
  
[Thought Hemorrhage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Thought Hemorrhage)  
[Eradicate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Eradicate)  
[Blood Oath](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blood Oath)  
[Grim Reminder](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Grim Reminder) (if you are also playing CAW-Go)  
[Cabal Therapy](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cabal Therapy)  
[Hint of Insanity](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hint of Insanity)  
[Meddling Mage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Meddling Mage)  
[Lobotomy](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lobotomy)  
[Cornered Market](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cornered Market)  
or [Exclusion Ritual](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Exclusion Ritual), which will even get rid of the first hawk.  
  
@ mrhardy12 : Storm Crow has been a staple of tournament decks for years. If you can't understand why, you've got a lot to learn about Magic.
